name: Michael Scott
motto: You miss 99% of the shots you don't take.

name: Phil Dunphy
motto: Do you see me saying “I'm done”? Never. Because there is no “done” in my name.

name: Hannah Baker
motto: What doesn't kill you make you stronger.

name: Steve Rogers
motto: I can do this all day.

name: Rosa Diaz
motto: I may not be the tallest or the most athletic but someday I will be the richest.
